Body:
Description: Wanted to enquire if there is a new update available for the server appliance. Online support doc suggests that there is a new version available (5.9.4.2) but when I check update, I don't see a new update show up.

We are on version 5.9.4.1.

What We've Learned Updated: 13.05
The customer asked about 5.9.4.2 server version. We provided the download link for the offline patch and the instruction to apply it.

Next Steps Updated: 13.05
Wait for the customer to confirm.
